sections_faq.title: Sections Faq
sections_faq.content:
Frequently Asked Questions

What is Buildy TW?

Buildy TW is a powerful tool that combines the flexibility of Tailwind CSS with pre-built components to help you create stunning websites quickly and efficiently.

Do I need coding experience to use Buildy TW?

While some basic understanding of HTML and CSS is helpful, Buildy TW is designed to be user-friendly for both beginners and experienced developers alike.

Can I customize the components?

Absolutely! All components are built with Tailwind CSS classes, making it easy to customize colors, sizes, and other properties to match your specific needs.

Is Buildy TW responsive?

Yes, all components and layouts in Buildy TW are designed to be fully responsive and work seamlessly across various device sizes.

sections_faq_2.title: Sections Faq
sections_faq_2.content:
Common Questions

To get started with Buildy TW, simply visit our website, sign up for an account, and explore our library of components and templates. You can then start building your website using our intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all new users. This allows you to explore all the features and capabilities of Buildy TW before making a commitment.

Yes, you can export your projects as clean HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. This allows you to host your website on any platform of your choice or further customize the code if needed.

sections_faq_3.title: Sections Faq
sections_faq_3.content:
FAQ

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for our subscription plans.

Is there a limit to how many projects I can create?

No, there's no limit to the number of projects you can create with Buildy TW. Create as many as you need!

Do you offer customer support?

Yes, we provide 24/7 customer support via email and live chat for all our paid plans.

Can I use my own custom fonts?

Absolutely! You can easily integrate your own custom fonts or choose from our wide selection of web-safe and Google Fonts.

Is Buildy TW SEO-friendly?

Yes, all websites created with Buildy TW are designed with SEO best practices in mind, ensuring your site is optimized for search engines.

Can I collaborate with my team?

Yes, our team collaboration features allow you to work together seamlessly on projects, managing permissions and roles as needed.

sections_brends_2.title: Sections Brends
sections_brends_2.content:
Our Brand Story

At Buildy TW, we believe in the power of design to transform businesses. Our journey began with a simple idea: to create beautiful, functional, and accessible web components for everyone.

"Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works."

- Steve Jobs

Creativity

We push the boundaries of design to create unique and inspiring web experiences.

We constantly evolve and adapt to stay ahead in the ever-changing digital landscape.

🤝

Collaboration

We believe in the power of teamwork and open communication to achieve greatness.
